thread.title: GSK buys out Novartis in $13bln shake-up

title: GSK buys out Novartis in $13bln shake-up
text:
GSK buys out Novartis in $13bln shake-up 1:48pm BST - 01:34 
GlaxoSmithKline said on Tuesday it will buy Novartis's 36.5 percent stake in their consumer healthcare joint venture for $13 billion in cash, and will also begin a strategic review of some other businesses. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
GlaxoSmithKline said on Tuesday it will buy Novartis's 36.5 percent stake in their consumer healthcare joint venture for $13 billion in cash, and will also begin a strategic review of some other businesses.
